posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server 12345@media screen and (max-width: 640px) { body { background-color: #f8f8f8; }} More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 在ECMAScript 5的strict模式下，这种情况的`this`已经被规定不会指向全局对象了，而是`undefined` Hexo var gitalk = new Gitalk({ // gitalk的主要参数 clientID: `60c65a59de1d329a02d6`, //上面获取到的值 clientSecret: `cb40384ee5c4f2973f2832ecc52308753b26a9f2`,//上面获取到的值 repo: `blogComment`, //您刚才建立仓库的名字 owner: 'tataqiuqiu', //你的GitHub用户名字 admin: ['tataqiuqiu'], //你的GitHub用户的名字 id: '1', //id不能重复，如果重复就会把其他页面的评论引进来 }); gitalk.render('gitalk-container');
